page.title: 15HOUSING
page.content: THIS AREA CONTAINS A VARIETY OF HOUSES. THE WEST END OF GREENOCK HAS LARGE DETACHED AND SEMI-DETACHED HOUSES AND FLATS. MOST OF THESE WERE BUILT IN THE 19th CENTURY AND ARE PRIVATELY OWNED. THE EASTERN END OF THE AREA CONTAINS SOME REDEVELOPMENT OF OLD RUN-DOWN PROPERTIES WITH NEW FLATS AND HOUSES. GOUROCK HAS BOTH PRIVATE AND COUNCIL HOUSES. THERE IS ONE 15 STOREY BLOCK OF FLATS. THE OLDEST HOUSES ARE IN THE TOWN CENTRE WITH NEWEST HOUSES ON THE SLOPES BEHIND THE TOWN. THERE ARE MANY OLD LARGE HOUSES ON THE EASTERN SLOPES AND THERE ARE NEW PRIVATE ESTATES ON THE EASTERN SIDE.
